reviewText: My favorite documentary for use in my Cultural Anthropology course. Unfortunately the director and publisher don't seem to understand that, if you make a documentary for educational purposes it's useless without closed captioning. You can also watch it without captioning on CultureUnplugged.com for free.

I bought this video for my dad because he lived in South Africa 30 years ago and knows a lot about the Bushmen. He really enjoyed it and thought it captured the Bushmen life well. It brought back memories for him.
